name: Nova Connect 4
description:
Pierre will present how to build on top of Nova, a zk scheme that can be thought of as a preprocessing layer for SNARKs. 

He will dive into Novaâ€™s relevancy for building zkConnect4: a provable connect 4 game engine where players can prove their games against a zkRL bot.

speakers.name: Pierre
speakers.bio: Pierre is an applied zk researcher working with 0xPARC. He is interested into both theoretical and practical applications of SNARKs.
